en.pre_deposit_rub_text:
You can top up your USDT balance in cash RUB via criptamat.

To top up, select Pay by QR on the criptamat, bring QR for scanning, insert bills into the bill acceptor and wait for USDT to be deposited to your SKY CRYPTO wallet balance.

Minimum amount: 1000 RUB.
Maximum amount per deposit: 15000 RUB.
The number of operations is unlimited.
Commission: 6% + 1 usdt

Crypto card: https://criptamat.ru/karta-kriptomatov-v-rossii/

QR code for deposit ğŸ‘‡
